name: The Demilich
description:
You are a Lich, an undead well of necrotic energy. You can channel necrotic energies to kill your enemies and animate their remains. One day you wake from your slumber, only to find adventurers raiding your crypt...

music:

Classic Horror 1, Oppressive Gloom, Graveyard Shift, Malicious by Kevin MacLeod (standard-license)
